arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "SELECT " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_CD\\" AS \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_ANAME\\" AS \\"VEND_ANAME\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"LOT_NO\\" AS \\"LOT_NO\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T1.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"INV_CTRL_FLG_DN\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\", " +" USER_MST.\\"USER_NAME\\" AS \\"USER_NAME\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_QTY\\" AS \\"PUCH_RTN_QTY\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"WH_CD\\" AS \\"WH_CD\\", " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_LOT_NO\\" AS \\"VEND_LOT_NO\\", " +" T2.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"UNIT_COST_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"UNIT_COST\\" AS \\"UNIT_COST\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PROCESSING_COST\\" AS \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"MATERIAL_COST\\" AS \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\" AS \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"DISC_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"NET_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"NET_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_COMMENT\\" AS \\"PUCH_RTN_COMMENT\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"EXCH_RATE\\" AS \\"EXCH_RATE\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_RATE_1\\" AS \\"TAX_RATE_1\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_RATE_2\\" AS \\"TAX_RATE_2\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_RATE_3\\" AS \\"TAX_RATE_3\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\" AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\" AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\" AS \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\" AS \\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\" AS \\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"TAX_CD\\" AS \\"TAX_CD\\", " +" T3.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"TAX_ROUND_TYP_DN\\", " +" T4.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"RTN_DEL_FLG_DN\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"RTN_DEL_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') AS \\"RTN_DEL_DATE\\" " +"FROM " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_WH, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'INV_CTRL_FLG' " +" ) T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'UNIT_COST_TYP' " +" ) T2, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'TAX_ROUND_TYP' " +" ) T3, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'RTN_DEL_FLG' " +" ) T4 " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.COMPANY_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.VEND_CD " +" AND M_WH.WH_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.WH_CD " +" AND USER_MST.USER_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.PUCH_ODR_PERSON " +" AND T1.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.INV_CTRL_FLG " +" AND T2.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.UNIT_COST_TYP " +" AND T3.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.TAX_ROUND_TYP " +" AND T4.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.RTN_DEL_FLG " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"RTN_DEL_FLG\\" = ? " +"ORDER BY " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_CD\\", " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"SELECT " +" M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_NAME\\" AS \\"VEND_NAME\\" " +"FROM " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"WHERE " +" M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD = SYS_MY_COMPANY.COMPANY_CD " +" AND SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM' " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ?"
"SELECT " +" M_WH.\\"WH_NAME\\" AS \\"WH_NAME\\", " +" M_WH.\\"PLANT_CD\\" AS \\"PLANT_CD\\" " +"FROM " +" M_WH " +"WHERE " +" M_WH.\\"WH_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" count(1) " +"FROM " +" T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_ITEM, " +" USER_MST, " +" M_WH, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'INV_CTRL_FLG' " +" ) T1, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'UNIT_COST_TYP' " +" ) T2, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'TAX_ROUND_TYP' " +" ) T3, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" DISPLAY_NAME, " +" VALUE " +" FROM " +" SYS_TYPE_VALUE " +" WHERE " +" NAME = 'RTN_DEL_FLG' " +" ) T4 " +"WHERE " +" M_ITEM.ITEM_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.ITEM_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.COMPANY_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.COMPANY_CD " +" AND M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.VEND_CD " +" AND M_WH.WH_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.WH_CD " +" AND USER_MST.USER_CD(+) = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.PUCH_ODR_PERSON " +" AND T1.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.INV_CTRL_FLG " +" AND T2.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.UNIT_COST_TYP " +" AND T3.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.TAX_ROUND_TYP " +" AND T4.VALUE = T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.RTN_DEL_FLG " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\" >= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_RTN_DATE\\" <= TO_DATE(?) " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" LIKE ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"VEND_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"WH_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" AND T_PUCH_ODR_RTN_RSLT.\\"RTN_DEL_FLG\\" = ? " +" AND ROWNUM <= TO_NUMBER(?) + 1"
